0: Breakfast and lunch at Garden cafe were excellent at 10 each
Multiple pools mean they are not too crowded
The staff were ALL pleasant friendly and helpful
1it was just a quick trip to the beach
My family enjoyed it along with all the amenities we will be back a couple more times this summer thanks for having us
I love that the Ramada Plaza has several pools swim up grotto heated pool kidie area hot tub another pool and is located right on the beach
It also has a patio grill a souvenir store and restaurant on site
Amazing pool areas with a groto bar inside the a big rock center of pool
1: But they provided a very nice breakfast buffet daily to compensate
The manager did move us to a recently renovated room after witnessing the medical issues my wife sustained staying in one of their older units
Pool Location was ok but that is all relative to what each individual likes
The room had a great view but was a standard small room for 150 a night off season
But would definitely stay again just for the beach location and pool
They are working hard to make it clean and updated
Even on a weekend i was able to get a peaceful sleep
Tonight is our first night of a weeklong stay
I even call to schedule room service
2: The beach is too hard for kids
The pricing on every amenity went up several dollars as well and the breakfast buffet needs improvement
I am looking forward to see how the resort looks after all the renovations are complete
House keeping skipped cleaning one day
Love the shower on handle is away from the spray nozzle
Though we did miss the old splash pad which used to exist east of the facility
You can swim up to a bar in the waterfall but we did not patronize it
The property was great although not very easy to navigate to your room on the beachside
At least we got a gulf side room that we paid for
Room looks like it has recently been redone very clean
